title: Bloomberg Markets: Baird on the `Innovation Blind Spot'
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Baird on the `Innovation Blind Spot'
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Ross Baird\u0010President\u0010Village Capital Group\u0010Discussing venture capital investing and his book "The Innovation Blind Spot: Why We Back the Wrong Ideas—and What to Do About It."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
